etymologies: 1930s: from early film serials in which episodes ended with characters in desperate situations such as hanging off the edge of a cliff

definitions: an ending to an episode of a serial drama that leaves the audience in suspense

examples.text: it will take more than outrageous cliffhangers to win the ratings wars

shortDefinitions: dramatic and exciting ending to episode of serial, leaving audience in suspense and anxious not to miss next episode

definitions: a story or event with a strong element of suspense

examples.text: the game was a cliffhanger right up to the final buzzer

shortDefinitions: story or event with strong element of suspense
